  "about": "# ReaSpeech

Speech recognition tool for REAPER using Parakeet TDT ASR model.

Features:
- Local processing (no cloud services)
- Fast transcription with Parakeet ASR
- Transcript editing and export
- Word-level timing
- SRT and CSV export"
